goal.en: Optimization quandaries manifest across diverse quantitative disciplines encompassing computer science, engineering, economics, just to name a few. This course aims to impart fundamental concepts of optimization methods, equipping students with the capability to code standard algorithms and tackle a variety of classic optimization problems.
goal.ch: 最佳化問題出現在包括電腦科學、工程學、經濟學等多元學科中。這門課旨在傳授優化方法的基本概念，讓學生具備編寫標準演算法並解決各種經典優化問題的能力。

textbook.en: Amir Beck, Introduction to Nonlinear Optimization: Theory, Algorithms, and Applications with Matlab, MOS-SIAM Series on Optimization, SIAM, 2014.
textbook.ch: Amir Beck, Introduction to Nonlinear Optimization: Theory, Algorithms, and Applications with Matlab, MOS-SIAM Series on Optimization, SIAM, 2014.

grading.en: The two major exams each accounted for 35％ of the semester results, and the homework accounted for 30％.
